subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: West Indies will be seeking a reversal of fortunes in more ways than one as it goes into the second of three five-day cricket  test matches against South Africa in Basseterre, St. Kitts, on Friday.
snippet: West Indies will be seeking a reversal of fortunes in more ways than one as it goes into the second of three five-day cricket  test matches against South Africa in Basseterre, St. Kitts, on Friday.
